server.net

Class ConnectionThrottleFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.mina.common.IoFilterAdapter
      • server.net.ConnectionThrottleFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.mina.common.IoFilter

    public class ConnectionThrottleFilter
extends org.apache.mina.common.IoFilterAdapter
    A IoFilter which blocks connections from connecting at a rate faster than the specified interval.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.mina.common.IoFilter
